abstract: California Judge Raymond Cadie rules that proposed ballot initiative that calls for killing anyone who takes part in gay sex is patently unconstitutional, relieving Atty Gen Kamala D Harris of any duty to clear measure for signature-gathering.
lead_paragraph: A judge has relieved Attorney General Kamala D. Harris of the duty to process a proposed ballot initiative that advocated killing anyone who engages in gay sex.

headline.main: California: Attorney General Can Ignore Antigay Initiative
headline.print_headline: California: Attorney General Can Ignore Antigay Initiative

snippet: A judge has relieved Attorney General Kamala D. Harris of the duty to process a proposed ballot initiative that advocated killing anyone who engages in gay sex.
